Tom, the XML editor is not us however, we should not fall out with an NPE.

fixed, added check for the preference store being null in various locations in
ExtendedTextEditor.

Will release after RCP conversion. leaving as assigned until then.

released changes to HEAD - note that the project layout has changed due to the
RCP conversion (ExtendedTextEditor is not in the org.eclipse.editors package).
